name: Architecture V2
title: Architecture V2
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/3752984577 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

The child-documents contain an architecture documentation for a future version of Tivian Access. This has nothing to do with the current Okta-Based version of Tivian Access.
